entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Woodstock
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:48 AM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -17.4°C

Humidity: 83 %

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon with 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Light snow changing to snow at times heavy near midnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy or freezing rain. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to freezing rain or ice pellets near noon. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 12 January 2023
